vsParam: Lady Cuphea~ You want to see me?

Everyone, thanks for coming.
I've been expecting you all.

I've been trying to figure out how to help you,
so I prepared the "Fairy Spoon".
Yes, the "Fairy Spoon". By using them during synthesis...

... the traits of the ingredients in the "Trait Inheritance" slot
can be passed onto the synthesized items.
Good for you, [px], you figured that out so soon.

Lady Cuphea... I'm sorry~
But I can't follow you~

M-me neither...
Lady Cuphea, could you please elaborate?

Hehe, all right.
Let me give you an example.

For instance, a "Green Apple" comes with
a trait of "DMG Increase".

But Peppermint, do you think such trait will work
on an item like "Green Apple"?
Um... No, I don't think so.

"Increase Damage"will only work when it comes with
attack items such as "unis" or "Puni Balls"...

So, what will happen if we use the "Fairy Spoon"
and "Green Apple" to synthesize "Puni Balls"? ♪

Um... The trait "DMG Increase"
will be passed onto the "Puni Balls"?

Uh—! Isn't that impressive!? With the "Fairy Spoon",
items can inherit "traits not included in the recipe"!

[px], hurry, confirm all the ingredients in your bag!
Maybe some ingredients have powerful hidden traits!!

You're welcome, Peppermint.
Take care and welcome back.
